message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay that price for the excellent value it offers.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer,  $120 is too low for me.  Could you do $170?
I'm still interested in the product, but $170 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $145.
